summary: Iteration 8 - Tested JSON validity fix and quick access buttons. All 5 requested features verified: 1) /api/health returns valid JSON, 2) Cash endpoints work correctly, 3) Quick access buttons (Casco, Máscara, Bastones, Botas) are visible, 4) Clicking quick access buttons opens search modal with correct filter, 5) Cash register integration is functional.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby` for DialogContent - accessibility improvement recommended

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working correctly. The 'Unexpected token <' JSON error has been resolved - all API endpoints return valid JSON. Quick access buttons (Casco, Máscara, Bastones, Botas) are visible in Nuevo Alquiler page and correctly open the search modal with the appropriate type filter preselected. Cash register integration is functional with session management working properly.
